attributes.action: Moor Lane Bridge (Weston super Mare), Widen the width between road bollards.
attributes.additional_details: This petition is for the width of the bollards on the Moor Lane bridge in Weston super Mare that crosses the railway line to be increased from the present 6ft 6" to 7ft as the existing bollards make it almost impossible for larger people carriers to get through without causing damage to their cars.
